name: @zhangly1403/3dbrowser
description: A high-performance 3D model browser based on Three.js, supporting IFC, 3D Tiles, GLB, and more.
author: zhangly1403@163.com

scripts.build: vite build && npx tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json --skipLibCheck && npx @microsoft/api-extractor run --local && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); fs.rmSync('dist/src', { recursive: true, force: true }); const dest = path.resolve('example/3dbrowser-lib'); if (fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.rmSync(dest, { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync('dist', dest, { recursive: true }); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); pkg.main = './3dbrowser.umd.js'; pkg.module = './3dbrowser.es.js'; pkg.types = './ThreeViewer.d.ts'; if (pkg.exports) { pkg.exports['.'] = { types: './ThreeViewer.d.ts', import: './3dbrowser.es.js', require: './3dbrowser.umd.js' }; } fs.writeFileSync(path.join(dest, 'package.json'), JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)); if (fs.existsSync('README.md')) fs.copyFileSync('README.md', path.join(dest, 'README.md')); if (fs.existsSync('LICENSE')) fs.copyFileSync('LICENSE', path.join(dest, 'LICENSE'));"
